think_procedure: First, understand the function of the 'innodb_max_undo_log_size' knob. It sets the maximum size of UNDO logs in MySQL. The default value is 1073741824 bytes (1GB). The minimum value is 10485760 (10MB). There is no special value such as -1 or 0 that would disable a feature or change the function of this knob. Therefore, it behaves like a regular numerical knob.
